translation.twi: Mewɔ Portugal.

translation.en: Thank you so much for inviting me.

translation.en: Asamoah doesn't know much about sports.

translation.en: I have to warn Kwabena.

translation.en: Let's play tennis this afternoon.

translation.en: I'm the only one who survived.

translation.en: I still have the sweater you gave me when I was thirteen.

translation.en: I want to find somewhere I can sit down and relax.
translation.twi: Mepɛ sɛ mehwehwɛ baabi a metumi atra agye m'ahome.

translation.en: Did you catch the train?!

translation.en: I have no more money in my wallet.

translation.en: Did Kwabena tell you anything interesting?

translation.en: Children should obey their parents.

translation.en: Where is the railway station?

translation.en: He was covered with sweat.

translation.en: Kwaku should do the same.

translation.en: Kwabena is Abena's boyfriend.

translation.en: How did you find my house?

translation.en: When she was three years old, her father died.

translation.en: Asamoah is away on a business trip.

translation.en: Do you want to go first?

translation.en: I remember hearing that music somewhere.

translation.en: Don't you want me to keep it?

translation.en: I have no home to live in.

translation.en: As it is, prices are going up every week.

translation.en: Asamoah thought Abena was the most beautiful woman in the world.
translation.twi: Na Asamoa dwene sɛ Abena ne ɔbea a ne ho yɛ fɛ sen obiara wɔ wiase.

translation.en: I lost my purse on my way to school.
translation.twi: Mehweree me sika kotoku bere a na merekɔ sukuu no.

translation.en: What kind of English is that?

translation.en: Asamoah is just like me.

translation.en: Wait. I want to show you something.

translation.en: He's rich and powerful.

translation.en: It's really windy.

translation.en: My brother-in-law is a policeman.

translation.en: Both Kwabena and Abena were born in Boston.
translation.twi: Wɔwoo Kwabena ne Abena nyinaa wɔ Boston.

translation.en: Have you ever heard of Kwabena Jackson?

translation.en: I don't think Asamoah is listening.

translation.en: It's extremely dangerous.

translation.en: Be careful. It's a fierce bull.

translation.en: This dog minds well.

translation.en: Would you help me clean the bedroom?

translation.en: He just returned from abroad.

translation.en: Did you tape that concert?

translation.en: I want someone to talk to.

translation.en: It'll rain soon.

translation.en: Kwabena doesn't look like John.

translation.en: He doesn't have enough money to buy a car.

translation.en: Kwaku reluctantly went to the dentist.
translation.twi: Kwakuko kɔɔ oduruyɛfo hɔ.

translation.en: Our streets flood when we have rain.

translation.en: Asamoah's French is pretty good.
translation.twi: Sɛnea afifide ne mmoa ho yɛ fɛ fa no, saa ara na Franse kasa nso te.

translation.en: Most children are playful.

translation.en: He was banished to an island for high treason.

translation.en: Asamoah helped us.
translation.twi: Sɛ́ Asamoah no, ɔboaa yɛn.

translation.en: A good coach is like a father to his players.

translation.en: I need this.

translation.en: I'd like to see Asamoah again someday.
translation.twi: M'ani begye ho sɛ mɛsan ahu Asamoa bio nnɛ.

translation.en: As far as I know, he has never come on time.
translation.twi: Sɛnea minim no, ɔmmaa da.

translation.en: The king once lived in that palace.

translation.en: I can't blame him.
translation.twi: Mintumi mfa sobuo no mmɔ so.

translation.en: They usually say that women live longer than men.

translation.en: I need a loan.

translation.en: If they don't want this, then what do they want?

translation.en: I can't believe Asamoah hasn't called.

translation.en: The boys bring their books every day.

translation.en: Find out what the problem is.
translation.twi: Hu ɔhaw ko a ɛwom.

translation.en: People want to own land.

translation.en: I didn't hear Asamoah leave.

translation.en: Rome was not built in a day.

translation.en: The game will start in an hour.

translation.en: His story sounds strange.

translation.en: I know it's not fair.

translation.en: She was shivering with cold.

translation.en: These dogs are big.

translation.en: I did not notice how glad she was.

translation.en: He gave money to each of his sons.

translation.en: Asamoah and Aku have a long distance relationship.

translation.en: Revenge is sweet.

translation.en: Many people think that children spend too much time watching TV.

translation.en: I have been learning to drive.

translation.en: It took the best part of my holiday to finish it.

translation.en: He didn't keep his appointment.

translation.en: He was young and innocent.

translation.en: Asamoah is looking at us.

translation.en: You need a job.
